example.question: All of the following can be found on a food nutrition label except

prompt:
Accurately answer the following question:

All of the following can be found on a food nutrition label except

Choices:
A. recommended serving size.
B. calories per serving.
C. a suggested meal plan.
D. a list of ingredients.


Instructions:
- Carefully read the question and all options.
- Select the single most correct answer.
- Respond ONLY in the following format: "The correct answer is A/B/C/D".
- Do not include any explanations, additional text, or punctuation besides the answer.
